Retain.

cards.name: Brake-Drift

cards.name: Coast
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
Retain 2 (3) cards this turn.

cards.name: Defensive Driving
cards.description:
Gain 20 (25) Block.
Discard 4 cards.

cards.name: Hairpin Turn
cards.description:
Deal 7 (9) damage.
If you have no driftermod:Drift, driftermod:Drift 4 (6).

cards.name: Hard Pass
cards.description: Deal 16 (20) damage. If this kills an enemy, gain 1 driftermod:Speed.

cards.description: Deal 3 damage and apply 1 Weak to all enemies.

cards.name: Keep it Steady
cards.description:
If you're Drifting,
driftermod:Drift 4 (6).

cards.description:
Deal 12 (15) damage.

Deal 10 (13) damage.
Gain 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Speed Burst

Draw 3 (4) cards.

Deal 8 (10) damage.
Draw 2 (3) cards.

cards.name: 135 Degree Turn
cards.description:
driftermod:Drift 5 (8).
This card's driftermod:Drift is affected by Strength and Dexterity.

cards.name: 180 Degree Turn
cards.description:
driftermod:Drift 8 (10).
Gain 4 (5) driftermod:Traction next turn only.

cards.name: 20 MPH
cards.description:
Discard 2 cards from your driftermod:Total-hand to deal 5 (6) damage to all enemies.
(Discard 2 more cards and double this card's damage for each driftermod:Speed.)

cards.description:
Deal 10 (15) damage.
driftermod:Drift 3.
Gain 2 (3) Strength while Drifting.

cards.name: Adaptability
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
While your hand is empty this turn, draw a card.

cards.name: All the Stops
cards.description:
Deal 7 (8) damage.
If Vulnerable, deal 7 (8) damage again.
If you have 2 or fewer cards in hand, deal 7 (8) damage again.

cards.name: Bravery
cards.description:
Gain 4 (5) Strength.
Gain 2 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Burn Rubber
cards.description: Deal 5 (8) damage.

cards.name: Burnout
cards.description:
Deal 14 (18) damage to all enemies.
Add a Burn to your draw pile.
Lose 1 driftermod:Speed.

cards.name: Cruise Control
cards.description:
Gain 2 Dexterity.
Your driftermod:Speed is considered to be 1 (3) less for its negative effects.

cards.name: Dangerous Game
cards.description:
Deal 14 (18) damage.
This costs 1 less for each Vulnerable you have.

cards.name: Drift Ahead
cards.description:
driftermod:Activate your driftermod:Drift.
Gain 1 driftermod:Speed for every 4 (3) driftermod:Drift.
Lose your driftermod:Drift.

cards.name: Emergency Brake
cards.description:
Retain.
Gain 5 (6) Block for each driftermod:Speed.
Lose all driftermod:Speed.

cards.name: Engine Rev
cards.description:
Innate
Draw 2 (3) cards and gain 2 (3) [E] next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Exhaust Pipe
cards.description: Exhaust a card (to gain 3 Block).

cards.name: Flame Trail
cards.description: At the end of the turn, all enemies lose HP equal to your driftermod:Total-hand.

cards.name: Floor It!
cards.description: Draw 8 (12) cards.

cards.name: Fuel Reserves
cards.description: The first time you have no cards in your hand, draw 5 (7) cards.

cards.name: Gas Gas Gas
cards.description:
Draw 3 (4) cards.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hard Corner

driftermod:Drift 6 (8).
Discard 3 cards.

cards.name: In the Zone

cards.name: Intimidation
cards.description:
Apply your Vulnerable to all enemies.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Last-Second Turn

driftermod:Drift 2 (3).
If you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, driftermod:Drift 4.

cards.name: Maneuver
cards.description:
Gain 4 (6) Block.
Gain 2 (3) driftermod:Traction this turn only.

cards.name: Need for Speed
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Gain 3 driftermod:Speed.

cards.name: Nights of Fire
cards.description:
Deal 14 (18) damage plus 4 (5) for each driftermod:Overdraw.
(Deals 14 damage.)

cards.name: Overtake
cards.description: Discard 3 cards to draw 4 (5) cards next turn.

cards.name: Pursuit
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Draw 2 (4) cards.

cards.name: Racing Spirit
cards.description: If you have 2 or fewer cards in hand, deal 10 (14) damage and draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Recovery
cards.description:
(Retain.)
Discard any number of cards, lose 1 Vulnerable and gain 3 Block for each.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Relentless
cards.description:
Deal 6 (9) damage.
Draw a card.
When this is discarded, add it to your hand and increase its draw by 1.

cards.name: Resolve
cards.description: While you have 2 or fewer cards in hand, gain 4 (6) more damage, Block and driftermod:Drift from your cards.

cards.name: Risky Approach
cards.description:
Gain 1 Vulnerable.
Draw 2 (3) cards next turn.

cards.name: Road Rage
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
Discard all Skills in your hand, replace them with RAGE.

cards.name: Safe Driving
cards.description:
Gain 8 (10) Block.
Lose 1 driftermod:Speed, and if you did, gain 8 (10) Block.

cards.name: Second Wind
cards.description:
Gain 6 (8) Block.
If you have 2 or fewer cards in your hand, gain [E] [E]  ( [E]) .

cards.description:
driftermod:Drift 4 (6).
Gain 1 driftermod:Speed.

cards.name: Sweeping Turn

driftermod:Drift 5 (8)
Your driftermod:Drift hits all enemies this turn.

cards.name: Swerve
cards.description:
driftermod:Drift 7 (9).
Gain 1 Vulnerable.

cards.name: Thermal Engine
cards.description: The first time you would draw while your hand is full each turn, gain [E].

cards.name: Traction Tires
cards.description: Gain 1 driftermod:Traction.

cards.name: Variable Turn
cards.description: driftermod:Drift 2 (3) X times.

cards.name: Zoom
cards.description:
Deal 4 (5) damage.
When you draw a card this turn, deal 4 (5) damage to a random enemy.

cards.name: Acceleration Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
At the start of your turn, gain 2 driftermod:Speed.

cards.name: Clutch
cards.description: Gear-up (+) or Gear-Down. (+.)

cards.name: Daring Stunt
cards.description:
Discard 12 cards to deal 50 (66) damage.
(Number of cards to discard reduced by 4 for each Vulnerable you have.)

cards.name: Deja Vu
cards.description: Play (Upgrade)  (and play) the last card you played this combat.

cards.name: Fierce
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage twice.
Increased by 2 for each Vulnerable you have.

cards.name: Final Gambit
cards.description:
Draw cards until your hand is full.
Gain [E] for each card drawn.
Die next turn.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ghost of Akina
cards.description: driftermod:Drift 2 (3).

cards.name: Hyper Crash
cards.description:
Deal damage equal to 8 times your driftermod:Total-Hand. Discard your hand and lose all driftermod:Overdraw.
(0 damage.)

cards.name: Impossible Turn
cards.description: driftermod:Drift 6 (9) twice.

cards.name: Inertial Drift
cards.description:
Double your driftermod:Drift.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Last Resort
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Put a card from your draw pile into your hand. (Gain [E] .)

cards.name: Natural Talent
cards.description:
Unplayable.
When this is discarded, add it to your hand.
Whenever this is the only card in your hand, draw a card.
~~- Ethereal. -~~

cards.name: Nitrus
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E] ( [E]).
Gain 1 driftermod:Speed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Perfect Balance
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of your turn, if you played an even number of cards last turn, Draw a (1) card.

cards.name: Pole Position
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage and gain 8 (10) Block.
If your hand is full, this costs 0.

cards.name: Pound Pavement
cards.description:
Draw 3 cards X times.
Retain your hand this turn.
 (Gain [E] .)
Exhaust.

cards.name: Speed Demon
cards.description:
Gain 1 driftermod:Speed.
Deal 4 (6) damage for each driftermod:Speed.
(4 Damage.)

cards.name: Spin Out
cards.description:
driftermod:Activate your driftermod:Drift.
Gain 2 (3) Thorns for each driftermod:Drift for one turn.
Lose your driftermod:Drift.

cards.name: U-Turn
cards.description:
driftermod:Activate your Drift.
Draw cards next turn equal to your driftermod:Drift.
Lose your driftermod:Drift.

relics.name: Modified '86
relics.description: When you would draw cards while your hand is full, gain 1 driftermod:Overdraw for each.
relics.flavorText: A car that isn't that impressive, but in the right hands is legendary.

relics.name: Steering Wheel
relics.description: On the first turn of each combat, Retain your hand.
relics.flavorText: This lucky steering wheel is a memento of cars past.

keywords.name: Driftermod:Activate
keywords.description: Gain Block and deal damage to the lowest HP enemy equal to your Drift.

keywords.name: Driftermod:brake
keywords.description: Draw 1 less card at the start of your next turn for each Brake.

keywords.name: Driftermod:drift
keywords.description: At the end of your turn, gain Block and deal damage to the enemy with the lowest HP equal to your Drift. When you Drift, gain Momentum (Max 2.) which maintains your Drift.

keywords.name: Driftermod:overdraw
keywords.description: If you hand is not full, you lose 1 Overdraw and draw 1 card until it is.

keywords.name: Driftermod:shift-down
keywords.description: Gain 10 Block. Gain 2 Dexterity. Lose 2 Strength. Lose 1 Speed.

keywords.name: Driftermod:shift-up
keywords.description: Gain 2 Strength. Lose 2 Dexterity. Gain 1 speed.

keywords.name: Driftermod:speed
keywords.description:
At the start of each turn, draw 1 extra card for each Speed and gain negative effects based on your Speed.
3+: Gain 1 Vulnerable.
5+: Lose 2 Dexterity this turn only.
7+: Lose 2 Traction this turn only.

keywords.name: Driftermod:total-hand
keywords.description: Your total hand is your hand plus your Overdraw.

keywords.name: Driftermod:traction
keywords.description: Traction improves Drift gained by cards.

mods.name: The Drifter
mods.description: A mysterious street racer from a far off land. NL Seeks to test his skills on the ultimate downhill, but first, he must reach the top.
